articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
Celtic return to action after the international break with Motherwell the visitors to Celtic Park. Every Celtic fan will be hoping they can turn in a performance like the one they signed off with against Aberdeen before the players went off to play for their respective countries. That 6-0 performance was almost perfect on […]
